name: Level Crasher: The Hardest 2D Platformer for no Reason
name_original: Level Crasher: The Hardest 2D Platformer for no Reason
description:
The first project made in my Game Prototyping class for college. The theme for this prototype was "Click, Click, Click" so the player must traverse the levels while a constant clicking sound plays, after certain number of clicks goes by then parts of the level start to disappear.

Assets used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/casual-game-bgm-5-135943

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
